product_name: Keen Marshall WP Hiking Shoes - Men's
long_description: With waterproof uppers that keep feet dry and well-cushioned midsoles for continued comfort, the men's Keen Marshall WP hiking shoes provide a supportive platform perfect for hiking. Waterproof nylon mesh uppers promote breathability and hold up to light hiking; synthetic leather overlays provide lightweight support. KEEN.DRY(TM) waterproof breathable membranes keep feet dry while allowing perspiration to dissipate. Polyester mesh linings wick moisture away from the feet for comfort, and are highly breathable. EVA footbeds provide ample cushioning, and are removable to accommodate orthotics. High-rebound polyurethane midsoles supply shock absorption for all-day comfort. Supportive thermoplastic urethane shanks enhance torsional stability on uneven terrain. Nonmarking rubber outsoles with 4mm multidirectional lugs offer excellent all-around traction.
short_description: With waterproof uppers that keep feet dry and well-cushioned midsoles for continued comfort, the men's Keen Marshall WP hiking shoes provide a supportive platform perfect for hiking.
